statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM customers;
SELECT MIN(id) FROM customers;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM customers;
SELECT SUM(id) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers OFFSET 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1 OR id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890'
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM campaign_results
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM campaign_results WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, sales_amount FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 50000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 100000
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8
SELECT customer_id, sales_amount FROM campaign_results ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, status FROM leads;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, outcome FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, lead_id FROM interactions;
SELECT c.customer_name, l.lead_name, i.interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN leads l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, ca.campaign_name, l.lead_name FROM customers c JOIN leads l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id JOIN campaigns ca ON l.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, ca.campaign_name, i.interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN leads l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id JOIN campaigns ca ON l.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, l.lead_name, i.interaction_type, i.outcome FROM customers c JOIN leads l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id WHERE i.outcome = 'successful';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT MAX(budget) FROM campaigns;
SELECT AVG(budget) FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name,email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id,name,email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT name,start_date,end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id,name,budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT customer_id,campaign_id,status FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id,customer_id,campaign_id,status,source FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT lead_id,subject,body,sent_date FROM emails;
SELECT email_id,lead_id,subject FROM emails WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses;
SELECT email_id,lead_id,response_type,response_date FROM responses;
SELECT response_id,email_id,lead_id,response_type FROM responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers,leads WHERE customers.customer_id = leads.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns,leads WHERE campaigns.campaign_id = leads.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM emails,responses WHERE emails.email_id = responses.email_id;
